biotools.summary:
Network-based Observability and Controllability Analysis of Dynamical Systems.

NOCAD - Network based Observability and Controlability Analysis of Dynamical Systems toolbox for MATLAB and Octave.

Daniel Leitold, Anges Vathy-Fogarassy, and Janos abonyi, NOCAD - Network based Observability and Controlability Analysis of Dynamical Systems toolbox (MATLAB version), 2017.
